CustomField.description: Dates pulled from Date FA was signed and Date First Payment
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Date_First_Payment__c), Lead_Completion_Date__c, IF( ISBLANK(Lead_Completion_Date__c), Date_First_Payment__c, IF( Date_First_Payment__c <= Lead_Completion_Date__c, Date_First_Payment__c, Lead_Completion_Date__c ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shows the date the client signed up (the first day they either made a payment or signed a fee agreement)
CustomField.label: Date Signed Up
